A fact: checker has rated the Facebook or Instagram post as "false", "altered", "partly false", or "missing context".
The content rated as: false" will be downgraded on Facebook and Instagram, resulting in fewer people seeing it.
Africa Check is an independent: non-partisan organization that assesses claims made in the public arena using journalistic skills and evidence.
Africa Check is a partner in Meta: s third-party fact-checking program to help stop the spread of false information on social media.
